name: Claudia Wang's Porfolio
tagline: Data Science | Data Analytics |  Business Analytics
body:
# **About Me**

Hello! This is **Claudia Wang**. A detail-oriented **Data Analyst professional**. 

I recently completed the **Master of Business Analytics** from SCHULICH School of Business, York University and worked as a **Data Analyst Intern** at the Art Gallery of Ontario during the last eight months.

### Core competencies  
> * **Machine Learning Design**
> * **Statistical Analysis** (Linear Regression, Logistics Regression, Hypothesis Testing, etc.) 
> * **Strategic Analysis** 
> * **Team Collaboration** 
> * **Project Management** 
> * **Revenue Optimization** 
> * **Data Management** 
> * **Customer Relationship** 

### Technical competencies
**Python, SQL, SAS, Hadoop, MS Office (Excel, Access, PowerPoint), PySpark, Tableau, PowerBI**

### Certifications
> * **SAS Certified Specialist** – Base Programming Using SAS 9.4 and Advanced Programmer for SAS 9
> * **Google Analytics** for Beginners and Advanced Google Analytics
> * **Microsoft Azure** Fundamentals and Delivering the Modern Data Warehouse
> * **Amazon Web Services (AWS) Certified Solutions Architect** – Associate Candidate 



# **My Data Science Projects**

 ## Time Series Project  
 ### [M5 Forecast - Accuracy | Estimate the unit sales of Walmart retail goods](https://github.com/claudiawang-tech/M5-Forecasting---Accuracy)  
> * Kaggle Code Competition: **Bronze Medal, Top 7% of 5,558 Teams**
> * Language: Python 
> * **Feature Engineering**
> * **LightGBM**

 ## NLP Project 
 ### [Tweet Sentiment Extraction | Extract support phrases for sentiment labels](https://github.com/claudiawang-tech/Tweet-Sentiment-Extraction) 
> * Kaggle Code Competition: Top 28% of 2000 teams
> * Language: Python  
> * **BERT Model: roBERTa** 

 ## Regression Project
 ### Allstate Claims Severity | Create an algorithm accurately predicting claims severity
> * Kaggle Recruitment Recruitment Prediction Competition
> * Language: Python  
> * **Feature Engineering**
> * **XGBoost**

 ## Deep Learning Project
 ### [Bitcoin Price Prediction | Develop trading strategies for live trading](https://github.com/claudiawang-tech/bitcoin-prediction)
> * Language: Python
> * Recurrent Neural Network (**RNN**) model
> * Linear Support Vector Machines (**SVM**) model
> * **PyTrend** 
> * **TensorTrade** for **Reinforcement Learning**

# **My Data Visualization Projects**

 ### [KMPG Virtual Internship | Discover potential customers to maximize values](https://github.com/claudiawang-tech/Data-Visual-Internship)
> * Analytics tools: **Tableau**
> * Dashboards for existing customers, previous transactions and new customers
> * Logistics Regression Model

 ### [Toronto Police Service (TPS) Incidents Analysis | Find better ways to dispatch incidents](https://github.com/claudiawang-tech/TPS-Analysis)
> * Analytics tools: **Tableau**
> * Dashboards for the incident types and the regions the incident happened

# **Contact Me**

Linkedin Link: [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/zi-claudia-wang-901592a2/)

Email: claudiawangubc@gmail.com
